data.message: i''m sick and fucking tired of kidrock and kims shit calling  me a fat ugly bitch desperatly trying to be u as for u i;m sorry i posted retarted shit on your page i thought i changed u bhut i guess thats just something i fell for cause its like your to good to post on my page now i didn't mean to be gone for so long but maybe i should consider dating after i get over tha hurt that u don't care or even like me cause you;ve said it too not kidrock thats kkim trying tio soften tha blow foor you i'm not correcting my spellingh either i think maybe just maybe you two have been together for so long you deserve each other keeop your fucking mouths off me cause i'';m losing wieght ur gona end up like tha fat  hate you both haley jadee tina marie  haideez
